summary: This document is a financial statement from Fifth Third Bank for Shocker Holdings LLC, detailing account activity for the period of September 1, 2014, to September 30, 2014. It includes information on account balances, service charges, and criteria for waiving fees.

persons.name: Phili Fintchrc
persons.context: Phili Fintchrc is identified as the relationship manager for the business account of Shocker Holdings LLC.

keyFacts: The account statement covers the period from September 1, 2014, to September 30, 2014.
The ending balance for the account on September 30, 2014, was $9,548.30.
A standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was waived due to the account meeting balance criteria.
The document indicates that the business did not spend at least $500 per month on its business credit card.
The total combined monthly average balance for the account was $9,552.30.
